attributes.action: Legalise electric scooters as a form of travel in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Allow electric scooters to be used on public footpaths on biker lanes and walkways
attributes.background: Legalise electric scooters as a form of travel for adults and students to and from school and work in the UK

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Legalise and regulate the use of privately owned eScooters before Spring 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553756
